name: MoniPX v1.1.2 - SSH & Terminal Fixes
body:
## 🐛 Bug Fixes

### SSH Key Authentication Error
- **Fixed:** "SSH session not found (ID: X)" error in production
- **Root Cause:** Session ID type mismatch between string and integer
- **Solution:** Added proper type conversion and validation in SSHManager
- **Files Changed:** 
  - `server/services/ssh/SSHManager.js`
  - `server/models/SSHSession.js`

### Terminal Layout Issue
- **Fixed:** Terminal appearing under navigation bar
- **Root Cause:** Incorrect positioning and z-index
- **Solution:** Terminal now renders in full-screen mode with proper positioning
- **Files Changed:**
  - `src/App.vue`
  - `src/views/SecureTerminal.vue`

## 📦 Docker Images

Multi-platform images (linux/amd64, linux/arm64):

```bash
docker pull mwanzaa12/monipx:1.1.2
docker pull ghcr.io/amwanza-mwz/monipx:1.1.2
```

## 🚀 Deployment

### Update Production

```bash
docker pull mwanzaa12/monipx:1.1.2
docker stop monipx && docker rm monipx
docker run -d --name monipx --restart unless-stopped \
  -p 3001:3001 \
  -v monipx-data:/app/data \
  -v monipx-logs:/app/logs \
  -e NODE_ENV=production \
  mwanzaa12/monipx:1.1.2
```

## 📋 What's Changed

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/amwanza-mwz/Monipx/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.2
